TopicTitle: Any news on when 0.24 is coming out?

Articles.Content: Seems like it has been longer than usual waiting for the next patch. I was planning on starting a new career game but I wanted to wait for the next update to the game to start it. Been waiting now for well over a month.

Seems like it has been longer than usual waiting for the next patch. I was planning on starting a new career game but I wanted to wait for the next update to the game to start it. Been waiting now for well over a month.

Awe, you poor thing... There, there, now, SQUAD will have the NASA ARM pack out "very soon" and 0.24 shouldn't be more than a "soon" after that, so you're in luck!
Interestingly, they've been saying things such as "soon" or "very soon" or even "very, very soon." I guess it's not "SoonÃ¢â€žÂ¢" this time.
I just want to face punch someone.

Awe, you poor thing... There, there, now, SQUAD will have the NASA ARM pack out "very soon" and 0.24 shouldn't be more than a "soon" after that, so you're in luck!

But i want 0.24 first! ARM might be after it.

pls squad.

I just want to face punch someone.

There's a whole world outside your door, buddy. Step out and enjoy the sunshine, and maybe face punch somebody.

Seems like it has been longer than usual waiting for the next patch.

It hasn't. The development cycle has been steady at 8-10 weeks for the last two years, with an extra couple of weeks added over Christmas because of holidays.

When it's done and not a moment sooner! Please refrain from asking for release dates on the forum in the future.

Thank you.
